structure.title: Career Objective
structure.summary:
The partial document is a resume of Harsh Redasani, an aspiring software developer. It highlights his career objective, educational background, technical skills, projects, achievements, co-curricular activities, and soft skills. Key points include:

1. **Career Objective**: Focused on contributing to software design, development, and optimization while exploring new technologies.
2. **Education**: Pursuing a B.Tech in Information Technology (2023-2027) and completed higher secondary education in science (2021-2023).
3. **Technical Skills**: Proficient in programming languages (Java, Python, C/C++, SQL, JavaScript, HTML/CSS), data analysis tools (Pandas, NumPy, Matplotlib, MS Excel), web development (HTML, CSS, JS, ReactJS), and databases (PostgreSQL, MySQL). Core areas include DSA, OOPs, debugging, and API integration.
4. **Projects**: Includes a sales tracker system, a speech correction app using AI, and an Amazon clone website.
5. **Achievements**: Solved 100+ LeetCode problems, completed a DSA course, and participated in AI/ML workshops.
6. **Co-Curricular Activities**: Engaged in online courses and workshops on DSA, web development, and AI/ML.
7. **Soft Skills**: Highlights adaptability, problem-solving, analytical thinking, collaboration, and communication.

structure.summary:
The partial document is a resume of Harsh Redasani, an aspiring software developer. It highlights his career objective of contributing to software development and exploring new technologies. The document outlines his educational background, including a B.Tech in Information Technology (2023-2027) and prior schooling in science. It lists his technical skills, such as proficiency in programming languages (Java, Python, C/C++, SQL, JavaScript, HTML/CSS), data analysis tools (Pandas, NumPy, Matplotlib, MS Excel), web development (HTML, CSS, JavaScript, ReactJS), and databases (PostgreSQL, MySQL). Core areas include DSA, OOPs, debugging, and API integration.

The document also details projects like a sales tracker, a speech correction app, and an Amazon clone website. Achievements include solving 100+ LeetCode problems, completing a DSA course, and participating in AI/ML workshops. Co-curricular activities include completing online courses in programming and data analysis, solving Striver’s DSA Sheet, and attending workshops on web development and AI/ML. Additionally, it mentions soft skills such as adaptability, problem-solving, analytical thinking, collaboration, and communication.

structure.title: Projects

nodes.title: BigBaar Daily Sales Tracker(Python, Excel) – Developed sales tracking and reporting system with validation and aggregation.
Speech Correction App(Flutter, Python, Firebase) – Built AI model for speech disorder detection with dashboards.
Amazon Clone Website(HTML, CSS, JavaScript) – Designed responsive storefront with categories, cart, and order summary.
